item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 11, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:

23. Show HN: Editable Games (123 points | 25 comments)

26. 3dfx: So powerful, it's kind of ridiculous (2023) (243 points | 209 comments)
27. Planes are having their GPS hacked. Could new clocks keep them safe? (163 points | 246 comments)
28. Sigint in Fiction (38 points | 15 comments)
29. Performance of the Python 3.14 tail-call interpreter (556 points | 160 comments)
